DOC.brief_title: Estrogen Therapy Prevention Progression Aneurysm ( EPPA ) Trial
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , randomize , placebo-control trial test effect estradiol prevention progression cerebral aneurysm . To evaluate effect , subject treat either oral estradiol placebo 6 month . Subjects randomly assign 1 2 group follow : Double Blind Treatment Group Open-Label Regimen A1 1 mg Estradiol daily 180 day B1 Placebo 180 day Each group give oral Progesterone ( 3300 mg ) 10 day end 90 day regardless menstrual pattern . Subjects ask keep menstrual calendar throughout trial . Serum marker draw baseline every 90 day result blind end trial . Magnetic resonance angiography ( MRA ) study brain perform month 6 .
DOC.criteria: Generally healthy woman , 4052 year age . At least one document saccular intracranial cerebral aneurysm detect via catheter angiography , magnetic resonance angiography compute tomography angiography . Clinical diagnosis perimenopause , define regular irregular menses without vasomotor symptom . Known suspect estrogendependent neoplasia . Endometrial proliferation , hyperplasia , malignancy screening . Known hypersensitivity estrogen , progestin . History myocardial infarction , ischemic heart disease , lipid disorder , congestive heart failure . Known suspected pregnancy , recent breast feeding ( within 6 month ) .
